wordGroup: crepe de chine n. 双绉；广东绉纱

sentences.en: So be prepared to throw away your ibuprofen and crepe bandages.
sentences.cn: 所以，准备好扔掉你的布洛芬或是弹力绷带。

sentences.en: With the help of 16 chefs, he prepared a 9.9 meter crepe in under 40 minutes.
sentences.cn: 在16名厨师的帮助下，他用40分钟完成了这个长9.9米的巨型卷。

sentences.en: Office cubicles are festooned with orange and black crepe paper and bowls of candy.
sentences.cn: 办公隔间在节日期间会被橘色和黑色的绉纸装饰起来，还会摆上大碗的糖果。
